price: Nítorí náà, tí wọ́n bá pẹ̀yìndà, sọ pé: “Allāhu tó fún mi. Kò sí ọlọ́hun kan tí a gbọ́dọ̀ jọ́sìn fún ní ọ̀nà òdodo àyàfi Òun. Òun ni mo gbáralé. Òun sì ni Olúwa Ìtẹ́ ńlá.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقُلۡ حَسۡبِيَ ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
